name: #NO2SPICE
description:
This campaign page, made possible by the generous support of the CareSource foundation, is designed to provide you with tools for learning and sharing about the dangers of K2/Spice.

https://www.healthycle.org/no2spice/

Alexander Sierputowski - GameDesigner/Programer
Alisa Hassett - Animator

*The City of Cleveland Department of Public Health’s Healthy Cleveland 2.0 Initiative’s K2/Spice public information campaign was made possible by the generous support of the CareSource Foundation. All campaign assets were created by YOUR STORY ON FILM LLC.
